timeline.diffHunk: @@ -66,9 +66,9 @@ Here is a graph about the TsFile structure. -![TsFile Breakdown](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/19167280/82113144-29262900-9786-11ea-83c6-1c45b6c1f3a5.png) + -This TsFile contains two devices: d1, d2.
